text: Aduga Ibungogi paona Syria sinba thunglammi. Amasung mahakki manakta misingna makhal kayagi lainana naraba pumnamak haibadi akanba cheina khaanglibasing, lai phattaba changbasing, sarei houbasing, aduga pangtha-sithaduna naba pumnamakpu puraklammi. Aduga Ibungona makhoi pumnamakpu phahanbirammi.
